name: Northfield Pharmacy
comment:
General pharmacy
  • treatment and prescription of medications for common medical ailments, including rashes, pink eye, insect bites, acne, and urinary tract infections
  • prescription of COVID-19 antiviral treatment (Paxlovid)
  • free delivery for prescriptions to all of Kitchener-Waterloo and surrounding areas
  • medication placed in pill organizers (containers for storing scheduled doses) at no extra cost
  • basic home health care supplies

MedsCheck - Appointments to review complex prescriptions with a pharmacist

Medications Return Program - Safe disposal of expired or unused medications, creams, and inhalers
serviceProvisionCode: Dispensing fee plus medication costs * prescribed medications may be covered by OHIP

description_of_this:
General pharmacy
  • treatment and prescription of medications for common medical ailments, including rashes, pink eye, insect bites, acne, and urinary tract infections
  • prescription of COVID-19 antiviral treatment (Paxlovid)
  • free delivery for prescriptions to all of Kitchener-Waterloo and surrounding areas
  • medication placed in pill organizers (containers for storing scheduled doses) at no extra cost
  • basic home health care supplies

MedsCheck - Appointments to review complex prescriptions with a pharmacist

Medications Return Program - Safe disposal of expired or unused medications, creams, and inhalers, Codes: Dispensing fee plus medication costs * prescribed medications may be covered by OHIP, Features: Wheelchair Accessible, Languages: English, Address: 465 Phillip St, Unit 9, Waterloo, ON, N2L 6C7, Location: lat: 43.4847, lon: -80.5409, Contact: phone: 519-725-3470, fax: 519-725-3471
